jobDescription: Collaborate with our Vertical Lead’s to develop a Data Science roadmap  Manage projects consisting of cross functional teams including Data Scientist, Software Engineering and Solutions Engineering  Work on building out Uptake’s suite of cutting-edge data science tools  Collaborate with the Data Science team members to identify common problems and areas for automation and standardization  Apply cutting-edge machine learning techniques at large scale to streaming data  Conduct research into advancements in algorithms, computing and statistics and apply those insights to Uptake  Communicate results to clients and end users.
